projects.title: General Project Information
projects.description: All articles, up to those dated as October 2022, were written in October 2022. You might notice that some are dated earlier than this. For organizational reasons, I have decided to date each project with its completion date. In the case of ongoing projects, the are simply dated with the date of most recent edits. This keeps everything in order, with proper context of which projects came first, with the trade off of adding some confusion to their dating.

projects.title: Project Fetch
projects.description: Project Fetch is a game developed by a three person team. The story follows a delivery dog on his journey across an animal world. Read more below! Art by Rachel Chen.

image.alt: Image of a mail-man dog standing in a forest

projects.title: FIRST Robotics
projects.description: It's our rookie year in FTC! Read about PARC Acadia #22070 and my role below.

projects.title: 3.5mm Jack Noise Remover
projects.description: My friend Trevor and I had noticed some static sounds in our IEMs, so I decided to build a solution! Click the link below to read more!

image.alt: Earbuds, audio jack with noise removal device
